channel.title: RSC Tool!
channel.description:
An easy to use RSC server loader!
Includes xEnt's Demonik bot! :D
-added Teoscape site and client.
It includes all the clients, so all you gotta do is click and play!
[img]http://i152.photobucket.com/albums/s197/WickedTHDJ/RSCT.jpg[/img]
http://uppit.com/0HSSXP

item.title: RSC Tool!
item.dc:creator: @MadTricks MadTricks
item.description:
@MadTricks wrote:

[quote=“Pan^Cakes, post:10, topic:185165”][quote author=Dark Anima link=topic=246891.msg2080273#msg2080273 date=1204347567]

he hates on anything thats not his when he cant
do shit himself… his server is shit
[/quote]Ex-fucking-cuse me? The source MadTricks is hosting is mine, and it’s extremely rude to call it shit. Who are you anyways? Which source did you code? What give you the right to insult mine?

Dark anima,i have seen you being very “cool” to own a server with npcs and objects,but you didn’t code them ,so nothing to be proud off.[/quote]
I have seen him fixing duping bug and adding those custom npcs.
So buzz off.

Read full topic
